title: Be Verb Tags
content: You are a student, [aren't you|are you]? She isn't here, [is she|isn't she]?
explanationEnUs: If the main sentence is positive, the tag is negative. If negative, the tag is positive.
explanationZhTw: 如果主句是肯定的，附加問句是否定的。如果是否定的，附加問句是肯定的。
explanationZhCn: 如果主句是肯定的，附加问句是否定的。如果是否定的，附加问句是肯定的。

title: Auxiliary Verb Tags
content: They have finished, [haven't they|don't they]? You can swim, [can't you|don't you]?
explanationEnUs: Use the same auxiliary verb (have, can, will, etc.) in the tag.
explanationZhTw: 在附加問句中使用相同的助動詞 (have, can, will 等)。
explanationZhCn: 在附加问句中使用相同的助动词 (have, can, will 等)。

title: Do/Does/Did Tags
content: He likes pizza, [doesn't he|isn't he]? You went to Paris, [didn't you|weren't you]?
explanationEnUs: For Simple Present and Past verbs (without auxiliaries), use do/does/did.
explanationZhTw: 對於簡單現在式和過去式動詞（無助動詞），使用 do/does/did。
explanationZhCn: 对于简单现在时和过去时动词（无助动词），使用 do/does/did。

title: Special Cases
content: I am late, [aren't I|am not I]? Let's go, [shall we|will we]?
explanationEnUs: Tag for 'I am' is 'aren't I'. Tag for 'Let's' is 'shall we'.
explanationZhTw: 'I am' 的附加問句是 'aren't I'。'Let's' 的附加問句是 'shall we'。
explanationZhCn: 'I am' 的附加问句是 'aren't I'。'Let's' 的附加问句是 'shall we'。

title: Intonation Meaning
content: You're coming, [aren't you|are you]? (Voice goes down for confirmation)
explanationEnUs: Falling intonation seeks confirmation (agreement). Rising intonation asks a real question.
explanationZhTw: 語調下降尋求確認（同意）。語調上升提出真正的問題。
explanationZhCn: 语调下降寻求确认（同意）。语调上升提出真正的问题。
